item.description: MOONGLOW DANCE at Nuchie’s in Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am. Be sure to come for a fun night and bring all of your friends. We’ll dance the night away to the music of our great DJ - D&J Productions. There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for everyone to enjoy. Dress to impress, and door prizes. For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I-84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the admissions table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Moonglow Dance
